msContents.summary: This manuscript is a transcription of MS 588 in the Raghunath Temple collection.

lg.l:
kalpātikrūra
kālabhrukuṭikuṭilatākalpakalpā
gramuṣṭiḥ
krudhyatkālīkaṭākṣāṃki
ta sukala...nim ekāṃtakālī |

krīḍaty asyākrameṇa krakacakṛti-
kṛtī kuṃtikuṃbhāgrakūṭakroḍeṣūtkṛtta-
kaṃṭhotthitarudhirakaṇākīrṇako
ṇaḥ kṛpāṇaḥ || 1 ||

khaṃ preṃkhadbhiḥ kha
rāṃśoḥ prakharakharaśikhā khaṃḍayan svai
r mayūkhaiḥ
khelāsaṃkhyeṣu khaṃjīkṛta
raṇarasikaḥ saṃmukhānāṃ khamitraṃ |

khyātaḥ saukhyasya khāniḥ khalu ka-
mitṛjuṣāṃ khecarīṇām akharvaḥ
khelaty utkhātakhatakhaḍgapratiyuvasu
khanatkāravān asya khaḍgaḥ || 2 ||

gāḍha..trasya goptigrahaṇam avagaṇa
yyāgrataḥ svargamārgaṃ
grasyantasya
mahāgresarakaraguṇitodagrajā
gradgabhastiḥ |

garvogragraṃthigotra
grahilaripu....bhaṃgīgṛhīto
garjaty agresarāgryagrahagilanagu
ruḥ saṃgare maṃḍalāgraḥ || 3 ||

ghrāṇaṃ saṃgrāmalakṣmyā ghanasṛtiyaśasām aghriḍitān_dyo maha
....sāhasasyālaghuhṛdayalaghur bhī
tyaghaughasya vighnaḥ |

ghoṭaḥ kīrtter gha
nābhāpaghanagajaghaṭāghātanairghṛṇya
nighno
ghūrṇaty u2 (ka).......raghṛṇisamāghrātighoro sya khaḍgaḥ || 4 ||

caṃḍaś caṃḍīśacakṣuś cirabhṛtaviṣamārccidhvajāc cānubhāle
caṃḍyāś cāmīkarājanacayaravacitaṃ kauryacaṃcuḥ |

citraṃ svācāṃtavīrāsur api ravirucā cuṃbitaś cākacikyāc
cakṣuṣkarmāṇi cūṣaty acirarucirucāṃ vaṃcako syāsir uccaiḥ || 5 ||

sevāyākṣudrarūpocchalitaripuśucau chādanaṃ kṛcchradeśevṛṣṭau
chāyāvāhāśanesracchalasamiti lasacchauryakālālipuccham |

bhrātacchāttriduragaṇakṣaṇaś chekahṛcchokakārī
chāyākāntacchavīcchāvyatikaravaśato mūrcchatīddho 'sya khaḍgaḥ || 6 ||

jaṃghālo jaitrajanyājirabhuvi janayañ jantujāte jvarārtiṃ
jīvātur bāhujasya trijagati jayino dorbhujaṅgasya jihvā |

jyājānir vyāgrajāgradgajaradanaśilābhaṃjanāja
srayogyo
jātajvālo jaṭāvān iha jayati jagajjitvaro muṣya khaḍgaḥ || 7 ||

jhātkārān_ jaitrajanye jhagiti janayato janmikarṇajvarārtiṃ
jhañjhāvātānukārān_ jhaṇajhaṇitijhaṇatkāriṇaḥ prormmijjihānaḥ |

jhāṣāṅkīṃ tām avasthāṃ jhaṭiti ripujanaṃ grāhayan_ dhūrjaṭīṣṭāṃ
jhūrannavrāmrāhiteṣūjjhitaraṇarabhasaṃ projjihīte sya khaḍgaḥ || 8 ||

ṭaṃkāroddhaṭṭitā yā jhaṭiti vighaṭayan_ koṭiśaś cāpayaṣṭiīṣ
ṭaṃko vidviḍdviṭgirīṇāṃ vairiparbatānāṃ karaṭikaṭakaṭāhātikudāgrakoṭiḥ |

duḥkūṭair yaṣṭikūtaiḥ kuṭukuṭilasaṭaiḥ paṭṭiśaiḥ koṭisaṃkhyaiḥ
kheṭair durghāṭavāṭān_ pratibhaṭasubhaṭāṃṣ ṭīkate muṣya khaḍgaḥ || 9 ||

ṭhātkārī kaṃṭhasīmanyatikaṭhinatare skaṃdhapīṭhe kaṭhore
pṛṣṭhāṣṭīlānukāre śaṭhakamaṭhapateḥ kuṃbhapṛṣṭhe 'pi caibhe |
drākakdrāghiṣṭhaḥ kaṭhoracchavijaraṭheataradyotasaṃghaṭṭamūrchatkoṣṭhāḥ kāṣṭhāḥ prakurvvan_ ripuśirasi luṭhaty etadīyaḥ kuṭhāraḥ || 10 ||
ḍiṃbho daṇḍāyudhasya pradhanaghanataḍiccaṃḍadoḥ kuṃḍalīṃdrakṣveproddaṃḍadarpadviradananigaḍo ḍiṃḍimaḥ śauryabharttuḥ |
asya prācaṃḍyabhāṃḍaṃ dhṛtamadhupagaladgaṃḍavetuṃḍaśuṃḍākāṃḍaṃ khaṃḍaṃ vitanvan_ yudhi dhutajaḍimā hiṃḍate maṃḍalāgraḥ || 11 ||

ḍhakkāsvārūḍhakīrttiprasṛtisuvijayaśrīvivoḍhā nirūḍho
vāḍhaṃ soḍhātigāḍhapraharaṇasamitau līḍhakoṣṇāstrasīdhuḥ |

rīḍhā gūḍhapraharttur draḍhimakulagṛhaṃ nyastaśastreṣu ṣaṃḍho
nirvyūḍhodgāḍhayuddhapratihatisu dṛḍhaṃ ḍhaukate muṣya khaḍgaḥ || 12 ||

prāṇā darpasya pāṇī raṇaśamanaśiśo kārmaṇaṃ dveṣaṇānāṃ
tūrṇaṃ sadvārabāṇavraṇakaraṇakṛtī kīrṇadurmarṣaṇārciḥ |

koṣṇadidviṭ_śoṇitāktaḥ kharakiraṇaghṛṇiśreṇiśāṇo ’ruṇaśrīr
udgūrṇo vāraṇānāṃ gaṇam asṛṇi śṛṇāty asya tīkṣṇaḥ kṛpāṇaḥ || 13 ||
tṛpyaddaṃtikṣitīṃdraṃ taralatarataratpattibhaṃgaṃ vighūrṇattuṃgāśvāvarttagarttaṃ niśitatamamilatkuṃtasaṃtānacakram |

tvaṃgattīkṣṇāsitūrvattimim anatidalacchaktiśuktiṃ raṇārccibdhiṃ
tāras tīrṇaṃ titīrṣus tṛṇalavavad arīn asya khaḍgaḥ stṛṇeḍhi || 14 ||

sthūlaṃ sthūlaṃ śvasadbhiḥ prathitapṛthupṛṣadvīkṣaṇais tīrthamātraṃ
saṃmanvānair apārthaṃ śithilaraṇakathair vepathuvyarthaśastraiḥ |

saṃprāptaiḥ sthāṇusaṃsthāṃ prathitapathacarais trastanetrātithitvaṃ
nītaḥ pratyarthisārthair vyathayati savidhasthān apīddho sya khaḍgaḥ || 15 ||
dṛpyaddoḥkālakūṭadrumataruṇadalaṃ darpadaṃtāvaleṃdradrāghīyodānalekhā daradalitadaleṃdīvaradroṇidehaḥ |
dīvyannaidādyamadhyaṃdinadivasamaṇidyotaduḥprekṣyadīptidausthityaṃ dīrghadīrghaṃ dadadarisudṛsāṃ dīpyate muṣya khaḍgaḥ || 16 ||
